md:
giải nghĩa từ "courts" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Courteous (adj): lịch sự, có礼
	+ Example: He was very courteous to the guests.
	+ Related words: courtesy, courtly, polite

* Court (n): tòa án, sân tennis
	+ Example: The court found him guilty.
	+ Related words: courthouse, courtroom, courtship

* Court (v): tán tỉnh, theo đuổi
	+ Example: He courted her for months before proposing.
	+ Related words: courtship, woo, flirt

* Courtyard (n): sân trong, sân nhà
	+ Example: The hotel had a beautiful courtyard.
	+ Related words: court, yard, patio

* Courser (n): người đi xe ngựa, người đua ngựa
	+ Example: He was a skilled courser.
	+ Related words: course, horse, rider

* Course (n): khóa học, đường đua
	+ Example: I'm taking a course in computer science.
	+ Related words: curriculum, syllabus, route

* Course (v): chảy, di chuyển
	+ Example: The river courses through the valley.
	+ Related words: flow, stream, run

* Courtier (n): quan lại, người hầu cận
	+ Example: He was a courtier in the royal court.
	+ Related words: court, royal, noble

* Courtyard (n): sân trong, sân nhà
	+ Example: The hotel had a beautiful courtyard.
	+ Related words: court, yard, patio
html:
giải nghĩa từ "courts" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Courteous (adj): lịch sự, có礼

    • Example: He was very courteous to the guests.
    • Related words: courtesy, courtly, polite

  • Court (n): tòa án, sân tennis

    • Example: The court found him guilty.
    • Related words: courthouse, courtroom, courtship

  • Court (v): tán tỉnh, theo đuổi

    • Example: He courted her for months before proposing.
    • Related words: courtship, woo, flirt

  • Courtyard (n): sân trong, sân nhà

    • Example: The hotel had a beautiful courtyard.
    • Related words: court, yard, patio

  • Courser (n): người đi xe ngựa, người đua ngựa

    • Example: He was a skilled courser.
    • Related words: course, horse, rider

  • Course (n): khóa học, đường đua

    • Example: I'm taking a course in computer science.
    • Related words: curriculum, syllabus, route

  • Course (v): chảy, di chuyển

    • Example: The river courses through the valley.
    • Related words: flow, stream, run

  • Courtier (n): quan lại, người hầu cận

    • Example: He was a courtier in the royal court.
    • Related words: court, royal, noble

  • Courtyard (n): sân trong, sân nhà

    • Example: The hotel had a beautiful courtyard.
    • Related words: court, yard, patio
